verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse 1:
Fill this room
Fill this place
Come and meet us face to face
Come and meet us face to face

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Let the weight of Heaven fall
Let it rain on us, downpour
Can you hear the waters roar?
Let the weight of Heaven fall

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Verse 2:
Move in power
Have Your way
Come and meet us face to face
Come and meet with us again

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
Saturate our hearts
Fill us up to overflowing
Saturate our world
We are ready, we are ready
Saturate our hearts
Fill us up to overflowing
Saturate our world
We are ready, oh!
